Name: isalnum
Description: true if c is a letter or digit

Name: isalpha
Description: true if c is a letter

Name: iscntrl
Description: true if c is a control character

Name: isdigit
Description: true if c is a digit

Name: isgraph
Description: true if c is not a space but is printable

Name: isprint
Description: true if c is a printable character

Name: ispunct
Description: true if c is a punctuation character

Name: isxdigit
Description: true if c is a hexadecimal digit

Name: islower
Description: true if c is a lowercase letter

Name: isupper
Description: true if c is an uppercase letter

Name: tolower
Description: If c is an uppercase letter, returns its lowercase equivalent

Name: toupper
Description: If c is a lowercase letter, returns its uppercase equivalent
